drawableObjects
Class Junction

java.lang.Object
  drawableObjects.Junction

public class Junction
extends Object

Junction is class that describes what an junction object should have.

Author:
Vincent Xue

Constructor Detail

Junction

public Junction(int iAbsoluteStart,
                int iAbsoluteEnd,
                int iLeft,
                int iRight,
                String iIsoformID,
                int inputColor)
Instantiates a new junction.

Parameters:
iAbsoluteStart - the absolute start of the junction
iAbsoluteEnd - the absolute end of the junction
iLeft - the left scaled coordinate of a junction
iRight - the right scled coordinate of a junction
iIsoformID - the isoform this junction is a part of
inputColor - the input color
